constraint: The email shall not contain a space character.
The email shall not start with a @ character.
The email shall have exactly one @ character.
The email shall include a dot character (.) after the @ character but before the end.
result: (let ((at_pos (str.indexof s "@" 0))) (and (>= at_pos 0) (str.contains (str.substr s (+ at_pos 1) (- (str.len s) (+ at_pos 1))) ".")))

constraint: The final character of the email shall not be a dot character (.).
The email shall not contain the word "manager".
